parameters.subject: CalcsLive Calculation Results
parameters.message:
=Hello!

This is an automated email from your n8n workflow using @calcslive/n8n-nodes-calcslive.

Calculation Results:
- Total Physical Quantities: {{ $json.data.calculation.totalPQs }}
- Mass Result: {{ $json.data.calculation.outputs.m.value }} {{ $json.data.calculation.outputs.m.unit }}

Best regards,
Your CalcsLive Workflow

nodes.name: Send Email
nodes.notes: This gmail node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# CalcsLive Demo Workflow Template

## Overview
Demonstrates @calcslive/n8n-nodes-calcslive custom node ({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} that brings unit-aware physical quantities (PQ) and calculations to the n8n ecosystem in a composable manner. Example workflow with cylinder mass calculations.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 6
- **Node Types**: 4
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking 'Execute workflow'**: manualTrigger
- **Cylinder Calcs: (D, h) => (A, V)**: calcsLive
- **Speed Calc: (d, t) => v**: calcsLive
- **Mass Calc: (ρ, V) => m**: calcsLive
- **Fields: (d, t)**: set
- **Send Email**: gmail

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
